title: HAP 89 - Separate but Unequal - E. Franklin Frazier
itunes:title: HAP 89 - Separate but Unequal - E. Franklin Frazier
description: Sociologist E. Franklin Frazier critiques the Harlem Renaissance and the “black bourgeoisie” for failing to embrace values that will empower black Americans.
content:encoded: Sociologist E. Franklin Frazier critiques the Harlem Renaissance and the “black bourgeoisie” for failing to embrace values that will empower black Americans.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
